ygData.subject: New to group
ygData.msgSnippet: I wanted to post real quick and say hello. I ve been playing EQ for about 2 1/2 years now. I play on the Rathe server, if anyone needs anything feel free to
ygData.messageBody:
I wanted to post real quick and say hello. I've been playing EQ for
about 2 1/2 years now. I play on the Rathe server, if anyone needs
anything feel free to ask. My toons are as follows:
Taladinos - 50 war (semi retired)
Fariel - 51 wiz
Morrog - 26 necro
Wahupta - 20 ranger
Glorfindol - 16 pally
Khaoslord - 12 mage
Lyzzarddo - 11 monk
Hughmun - 10 shammy
The guild I belong to is called "Cries on Havoc"
I'm also curious if anyone lives around St. Louis, Mo.
